scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && shx mkdir dist/proto && shx cp src/proto/zeebe.proto dist/proto/
scripts.sm:start: . env/sm-mt.env && docker compose --env-file docker/.env -f docker/docker-compose-multitenancy.yaml -f docker/docker-compose-modeler.yaml up -d && docker/suppress-es-deprecation.sh
scripts.sm:stop: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose-multitenancy.yaml -f docker/docker-compose-modeler.yaml down && docker/cleanup-volumes.sh
scripts.sm:st:start: . env/sm-mt.env && docker compose --env-file docker/.env -f docker/docker-compose.yaml -f docker/docker-compose-modeler.yaml up -d && docker/suppress-es-deprecation.sh
scripts.sm:st:stop: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml -f docker/docker-compose-modeler.yaml down && docker/cleanup-volumes.sh
scripts.test:8.8:sm: TEST_VERSION=8.8 TEST_DEPLOYMENT=self-managed TEST_TENANCY=single-tenant TEST_SECURITY=unsecured vitest run --sequence.concurrent=false
scripts.test:8.8:saas: TEST_VERSION=8.8 TEST_DEPLOYMENT=saas TEST_TENANCY=single-tenant TEST_SECURITY=secured vitest run --sequence.concurrent=false --sequence.setupFiles=list
scripts.test:8.7:mt: TEST_VERSION=8.7 TEST_DEPLOYMENT=self-managed TEST_TENANCY=multi-tenant TEST_SECURITY=secured vitest run --sequence.concurrent=false
scripts.test:8.7:sm: TEST_VERSION=8.7 TEST_DEPLOYMENT=self-managed TEST_TENANCY=single-tenant TEST_SECURITY=secured vitest run --sequence.concurrent=false
scripts.test:8.7:saas: TEST_VERSION=8.7 TEST_DEPLOYMENT=saas TEST_TENANCY=single-tenant TEST_SECURITY=secured vitest run --sequence.concurrent=false
scripts.test:smoketest: npm run build && node smoke-test/smoke-test.js && npx tsd --typings dist/
scripts.test:c8run: TEST_VERSION=8.8 TEST_DEPLOYMENT=self-managed TEST_TENANCY=single-tenant TEST_SECURITY=unsecured vitest run --sequence.concurrent=false
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
